snippet.title: Little Big Planet PS Vita - Story Mode Part 1
snippet.description:
This is my blind HD Let's Play with live commentary on LittleBigPlanet for the Sony PS Vita! This is part 1 of the Story Mode and in this vid we see the opening cutscene, go through the introduction, and do the first stage! Make sure to leave a "LIKE" and a comment if you enjoyed the vid! It helps me out a ton! Thanks for watching and enjoy the video! :D

Subscribe to the Show!!!
http://www.youtube.com/show/littlebigplanetpsvita

Follow Me On Twitter!
https://twitter.com/#!/Cobanermani456

Like Me On Facebook! 
http://www.facebook.com/Cobanermani456

Video Tags:
little big planet ps vita ps3 let's play walkthrough playthrough lp cobanermani456 sonic adventure hd gravity rush uncharted golden abyss wipeout2048 god of war hilarious first blind i'm noob wii u sony rocks lbp 1 2 3 high quality touch screen gyro co op sackboy ballsack lol jk xD creative make your own world nathan drake costumes dlc afrotastic cutscenes boss final stage world
